name: Find the Water Chip
objective: Locate and retrieve a replacement water chip for Vault 13.
first_tasks: Exit Vault 13 and explore the wasteland.
Travel to Vault 15 and search for the water chip.
Explore Necropolis to find Vault 12.

first_task_locations.name: Vault 13
first_task_locations.description: The player's home vault, facing a critical water shortage.

first_task_locations.name: Vault 15
first_task_locations.description: A neighboring vault that may contain a functional water chip.

quest_giver.name: Vault 13 Overseer
quest_giver.description: Leader of Vault 13, assigns the quest to find the water chip.

reward.name: Experience Points
reward.description: Earned for successfully retrieving the water chip.

description: "Our vault's water chip has failed. Without it, we have only 150 days of water left. You must find a replacement before it's too late. Vault 15 might have what we need, but it's long been abandoned. Be careful out there. The Wasteland is dangerous."

name: Calm Rebel Faction
objective: Convince the rebel faction in Vault 13 to remain within the vault.
first_tasks: Speak to upset Vault 13 citizens to learn about the rebel meetings.

first_task_locations.name: Vault 13 Living Quarters
first_task_locations.description: Residential area where Vault 13 inhabitants reside.

quest_giver.name: Upset Vault Dweller
quest_giver.description: A concerned resident expressing dissatisfaction with the current situation.

reward.name: Experience Points
reward.description: Awarded for successfully convincing the rebels to stay.

description: Upon returning to Vault 13 during the search for the water chip, the Vault Dweller discovers unrest among the citizens. Some residents, led by Theresa, are contemplating leaving the safety of the vault to face the unknowns of the wasteland. By engaging with the upset dwellers and attending their meeting at 17:00 in Theresa's quarters, the Vault Dweller has an opportunity to persuade them to remain, ensuring the stability and unity of the vault community.

name: Find the Water Thief
objective: Identify and stop the person stealing water from Vault 13.
first_tasks: Investigate reports of missing water rations in Vault 13.

first_task_locations.name: Vault 13 Storage Area
first_task_locations.description: The area where the vault's water supply is kept.

quest_giver.name: Vault 13 Overseer
quest_giver.description: The leader of Vault 13, responsible for the security and well-being of its inhabitants.

reward.name: Experience Points
reward.description: Earned for identifying the thief.

reward.name: Karma
reward.description: A moral reputation boost for solving the issue.

description: Water rations in Vault 13 are disappearing, and the Overseer tasks the Vault Dweller with uncovering the culprit. By speaking with vault residents and investigating the storage area, the thief—Jacob—can be discovered. The Vault Dweller must then decide whether to report Jacob to the Overseer, let him go, or deal with him personally.

name: Destroy the Mutant Leader
objective: Eliminate the Master, leader of the mutant army.
first_tasks: Infiltrate the Cathedral and locate the Master.

first_task_locations.name: The Cathedral
first_task_locations.description: A heavily guarded structure serving as the headquarters of the Children of the Cathedral, where the Master resides.

quest_giver.name: Brotherhood of Steel Elders
quest_giver.description: The high-ranking leaders of the Brotherhood of Steel, who see the Master as a major threat.

reward.name: Experience Points
reward.description: Earned for eliminating the Master.

reward.name: Brotherhood Support
reward.description: Assistance from the Brotherhood in future battles.

description: The Master, a mutated being seeking to unite all life under a single species, leads a growing army of Super Mutants. The Vault Dweller is tasked with infiltrating the Cathedral, navigating its defenses, and eliminating the Master through direct combat or by sabotaging his life support system. The outcome affects the future of the wasteland.

name: Destroy the Source of the Mutants
objective: Destroy the Military Base producing Super Mutants.
first_tasks: Locate the Mariposa Military Base and find a way inside.

first_task_locations.name: Mariposa Military Base
first_task_locations.description: A pre-war military installation repurposed by the Master’s forces as a Super Mutant production facility.

quest_giver.name: Brotherhood of Steel Elders
quest_giver.description: The high-ranking leaders of the Brotherhood of Steel, determined to stop the mutant threat.

reward.name: Experience Points
reward.description: Earned for successfully destroying the base.

reward.name: Brotherhood Assistance
reward.description: Continued support from the Brotherhood for future endeavors.

description: The Vault Dweller must infiltrate the Mariposa Military Base, which is heavily guarded by Super Mutants. The base contains the vats responsible for the Forced Evolutionary Virus (FEV) mutation process. To stop the creation of new mutants, the facility must be sabotaged, either by setting off an explosion in the reactor or activating the self-destruct sequence. The mission is critical to weakening the Master's army.

name: Obtain More Equipment
objective: Acquire better equipment to increase survivability in the wasteland.
first_tasks: Find sources of better armor and weapons.

first_task_locations.name: Gun Runners
first_task_locations.description: A merchant group specializing in high-quality weapons and armor, located in a fortified compound.

first_task_locations.name: Brotherhood of Steel
first_task_locations.description: A secretive technology-focused faction that offers advanced gear after proving one's worth.

first_task_locations.name: The Hub
first_task_locations.description: A major trading center where various merchants sell weapons, armor, and ammunition.

quest_giver.name: Self-initiated
quest_giver.description: The Vault Dweller realizes the need for better gear to survive the increasing threats of the wasteland.

reward.name: Improved Gear
reward.description: Access to better weapons, armor, and supplies.

reward.name: Increased Survival Chances
reward.description: Higher durability and combat effectiveness.

description: As the Vault Dweller progresses through the wasteland, they recognize the necessity of acquiring superior equipment to handle tougher enemies and challenges. This quest involves visiting different vendors, scavenging locations, or earning the trust of powerful factions to gain access to high-quality gear.

name: Research Important Information
objective: Gather crucial intelligence to aid in survival and decision-making.
first_tasks: Locate sources of valuable information.

first_task_locations.name: The Brotherhood of Steel
first_task_locations.description: A technologically advanced faction with archives containing pre-war knowledge and classified data.

first_task_locations.name: The Hub
first_task_locations.description: A central trading hub where rumors, news, and records of past events can be found.

first_task_locations.name: The Followers of the Apocalypse
first_task_locations.description: A group dedicated to preserving and distributing knowledge for the betterment of society.

quest_giver.name: Self-initiated
quest_giver.description: The Vault Dweller realizes the importance of knowledge in navigating the wasteland.

reward.name: Crucial Intel
reward.description: New knowledge that can unlock better strategies, locations, and opportunities.

reward.name: Potential Quest Unlocks
reward.description: Access to new quests or better solutions to ongoing problems.

tools: Speech Skill (for extracting useful data from NPCs)
description: The Vault Dweller must seek out and analyze important information that could influence major decisions. This may involve speaking to knowledgeable individuals, hacking terminals, reading old logs, or piecing together scattered intelligence to uncover the truth about the wasteland and its factions.

name: Unlock the Armory
objective: Gain access to a restricted armory to acquire powerful weapons and equipment.
first_tasks: Find a way to bypass or unlock the armory doors.

first_task_locations.name: Military Base
first_task_locations.description: A heavily fortified location containing high-grade weapons and armor.

first_task_locations.name: Vault Armory
first_task_locations.description: A secure storage area within a vault, filled with pre-war supplies.

quest_giver.name: Self-initiated or Faction Leader
quest_giver.description: The need for better equipment drives the Vault Dweller to seek access, or a faction leader assigns the task.

reward.name: Advanced Weaponry
reward.description: Powerful weapons such as energy rifles, explosives, or heavy firearms.

reward.name: High-Quality Armor
reward.description: Stronger defensive gear to improve survivability.

reward.name: Additional Supplies
reward.description: Ammunition, medical supplies, and explosives.

tools: Explosives (as a last resort to force entry)
description: The Vault Dweller must find a way to enter a secured armory, either through skill, deception, or force. The armory holds valuable supplies that can significantly impact survival and combat effectiveness.

name: Rescue Tandi from the Raiders
objective: Rescue Tandi, the daughter of Aradesh, from the Khans.
first_tasks: Find Tandi's location within the Khans' camp.

first_task_locations.name: Khan Raider Camp
first_task_locations.description: A fortified encampment occupied by the Khans, a dangerous group of raiders.

quest_giver.name: Aradesh
quest_giver.description: The leader of Shady Sands, deeply concerned about his kidnapped daughter.

reward.name: Experience Points
reward.description: Earned for successfully rescuing Tandi.

reward.name: Gratitude from Shady Sands
reward.description: The town will be appreciative of your actions, improving relations.

tools: Stealth (to sneak in and rescue Tandi)
Combat Skills (to fight the Khans if necessary)
description: Tandi, the daughter of Aradesh, has been kidnapped by the Khans. The Vault Dweller must infiltrate the raider camp and rescue her, either through diplomacy, stealth, or combat. The outcome will determine the fate of Shady Sands and the player's standing in the wasteland.

name: Stop the Radscorpions
objective: Eliminate the radscorpions threatening Shady Sands.
first_tasks: Locate the radscorpion cave and eliminate the threat.

first_task_locations.name: Radscorpion Cave
first_task_locations.description: A dark and dangerous cave infested with large mutated radscorpions.

quest_giver.name: Aradesh
quest_giver.description: The leader of Shady Sands, worried about the radscorpion threat.

reward.name: Experience Points
reward.description: Earned for successfully eliminating the radscorpions.

reward.name: Caps
reward.description: A reward for aiding Shady Sands.

reward.name: Improved Reputation
reward.description: Shady Sands residents will appreciate your help.

tools: Melee or ranged weapons to fight radscorpions
Antidote in case of radscorpion venom poisoning
description: The village of Shady Sands is plagued by deadly radscorpions that threaten its people. Aradesh, the town leader, seeks help in dealing with the menace. The Vault Dweller must enter the radscorpion cave and eliminate them to ensure the safety of Shady Sands.

name: Talk to Katrina
objective: Learn about survival and Vault 13's history from Katrina.
first_tasks: Speak with Katrina near the entrance of Shady Sands.

first_task_locations.name: Shady Sands Entrance
first_task_locations.description: The entrance to Shady Sands where Katrina stands, offering advice to newcomers.

quest_giver.name: Katrina
quest_giver.description: A former Vault 15 resident who provides guidance to travelers.

reward.name: Experience Points
reward.description: Earned for engaging in conversation and learning valuable information.

description: Katrina, a former resident of Vault 15, stands at the entrance of Shady Sands, helping wanderers understand the world outside the vaults. Speaking with her provides background on Vault 13, the dangers of the wasteland, and basic survival tips.

name: Improve Shady Sands' Agriculture
objective: Help Shady Sands improve their crop yields by providing information on crop rotation.
first_tasks: Speak with the farmers in Shady Sands about their agricultural issues.

first_task_locations.name: Shady Sands Farms
first_task_locations.description: The farming area in Shady Sands where crops are grown.

quest_giver.name: Curtis
quest_giver.description: A farmer from Shady Sands struggling with inefficient farming methods.

reward.name: Experience Points
reward.description: Gained for providing helpful agricultural knowledge to the farmers.

description: The people of Shady Sands rely on agriculture for survival, but their farming techniques are inefficient. By educating the farmers about crop rotation, the Vault Dweller helps improve their food production, securing a more sustainable future for the settlement.

name: Recruit Ian
objective: Convince Ian to join as a companion.
first_tasks: Talk to Ian and persuade him to join.

first_task_locations.name: Shady Sands
first_task_locations.description: A small settlement trying to survive in the wasteland.

quest_giver.name: Ian
quest_giver.description: A former caravan guard looking for work.

reward.name: Ian's Assistance
reward.description: Ian joins the player as a companion, aiding in combat.

description: Ian, a former caravan guard, is willing to join the Vault Dweller if convinced. He can be recruited through conversation, offering him payment, or appealing to his sense of adventure.

name: Make Poison Antidote
objective: Create an antidote to cure radscorpion venom.
first_tasks: Obtain a sample of radscorpion venom.
Find someone who can create an antidote.

first_task_locations.name: Shady Sands
first_task_locations.description: A small settlement plagued by radscorpions.

first_task_locations.name: Radscorpion Caves
first_task_locations.description: A cave system infested with radscorpions.

quest_giver.name: Aradesh
quest_giver.description: Leader of Shady Sands, concerned about the radscorpion threat.

reward.name: Radscorpion Antidote
reward.description: A cure for radscorpion venom.

reward.name: Experience Points
reward.description: Earn experience for helping the settlement.

description: Shady Sands is dealing with a radscorpion infestation. The player is tasked with acquiring radscorpion venom and bringing it to a knowledgeable NPC to create an antidote.

name: Cure Jarvis of Radscorpion Poison
objective: Find a cure for Jarvis, who has been poisoned by radscorpions.
first_tasks: Obtain or craft a Radscorpion Antidote.
Deliver the antidote to Jarvis.

first_task_locations.name: Shady Sands
first_task_locations.description: A small settlement dealing with a radscorpion problem.

quest_giver.name: Aradesh
quest_giver.description: Leader of Shady Sands, concerned about the well-being of his people.

reward.name: Experience Points
reward.description: Earn experience for curing Jarvis.

description: Jarvis, a resident of Shady Sands, has been poisoned by radscorpion venom. The player must acquire or create an antidote and deliver it to him to save his life.

name: Join the Khans
objective: Prove loyalty to the Khans and become a member.
first_tasks: Speak with Garl, the leader of the Khans.
Complete the initiation task assigned by Garl.

first_task_locations.name: Khans' Camp
first_task_locations.description: A raider stronghold controlled by the Khans, located in the wasteland.

quest_giver.name: Garl
quest_giver.description: Leader of the Khans, a ruthless and powerful figure.

reward.name: Khans Membership
reward.description: The player is recognized as a member of the Khans.

description: The player must speak to Garl and prove their worth to join the Khans, a dangerous raider faction. The initiation task may involve combat or another challenge to demonstrate strength and loyalty.

name: Free the Slaves
objective: Rescue the slaves held by the Khans.
first_tasks: Locate the slaves in the Khans' camp.
Eliminate or negotiate with the Khans guarding them.
Unlock or break open their restraints to free them.

first_task_locations.name: Khans' Camp
first_task_locations.description: A raider stronghold where the Khans keep their captives.

quest_giver.name: None (Optional Quest)
quest_giver.description: The player can choose to free the slaves without a direct quest giver.

reward.name: Karma Increase
reward.description: The player's reputation improves for freeing the slaves.

description: The player can attempt to free the slaves held by the Khans through combat or stealth. This action improves the player's moral standing but may provoke hostility from the Khans.

name: Rescue Sinthia
objective: Save Sinthia from a violent thug in the Skum Pitt.
first_tasks: Enter the Skum Pitt bar.
Confront the thug threatening Sinthia.
Decide whether to de-escalate, fight, or negotiate.

first_task_locations.name: Skum Pitt
first_task_locations.description: A bar in Junktown where Sinthia is being threatened.

quest_giver.name: None (Triggered by Event)
quest_giver.description: The quest starts when the player witnesses Sinthia in distress.

reward.name: Karma Increase
reward.description: Rescuing Sinthia improves the player's reputation.

description: While visiting the Skum Pitt, the player encounters Sinthia being harassed by a thug. The situation can be resolved through persuasion, intimidation, or combat. Successfully helping Sinthia improves the player's standing in Junktown.

name: Stop Gizmo
objective: Gather evidence against Gizmo or kill him to stop his criminal activities.
first_tasks: Speak with Killian Darkwater about Gizmo.
Obtain evidence of Gizmo’s assassination attempt.
Decide whether to arrest or kill Gizmo.

first_task_locations.name: Darkwater’s General Store
first_task_locations.description: Killian Darkwater’s store in Junktown where he discusses Gizmo’s crimes.

first_task_locations.name: Gizmo’s Casino
first_task_locations.description: A gambling den where Gizmo operates his criminal activities.

quest_giver.name: Killian Darkwater
quest_giver.description: The mayor and store owner of Junktown, seeking to remove Gizmo.

reward.name: Caps
reward.description: A monetary reward for taking down Gizmo.

reward.name: Karma Increase
reward.description: Improves player reputation in Junktown.

description: Gizmo, the crime lord of Junktown, is suspected of plotting an assassination. The player must gather proof of his crimes by recording his confession or killing him directly. Completing the quest earns the player rewards and improves their reputation.

name: Bust the Skulz Gang
objective: Help Lars and Killian eliminate the Skulz gang causing trouble in Junktown.
first_tasks: Talk to Lars about the Skulz gang.
Gather evidence or find a way to stop them.
Decide whether to help law enforcement or join the gang.

first_task_locations.name: Junktown Guard Barracks
first_task_locations.description: Lars and the town guards' base where they organize security.

first_task_locations.name: Skulz Hideout
first_task_locations.description: A hideout where the gang gathers and plans their criminal activities.

quest_giver.name: Lars
quest_giver.description: The head of Junktown’s guards, determined to end the Skulz gang’s rule.

reward.name: Caps
reward.description: A monetary reward for defeating the gang.

reward.name: Karma Increase
reward.description: Improves reputation in Junktown.

description: The Skulz gang has been causing problems in Junktown. Lars, the head guard, wants them taken down. The player can either help Lars arrest or kill the gang members or betray the guards and join the gang. The outcome affects Junktown’s stability.

name: Save Killian's Life
objective: Prevent the assassination of Killian Darkwater, the mayor and shopkeeper of Junktown.
first_tasks: Speak with Killian in his store.
Witness the assassination attempt by a hired gun.
Stop the assassin before he kills Killian.

first_task_locations.name: Darkwater General Store
first_task_locations.description: Killian's shop in Junktown, where the assassination attempt occurs.

quest_giver.name: Killian Darkwater
quest_giver.description: The mayor and general store owner of Junktown who is targeted for assassination.

reward.name: Caps
reward.description: A monetary reward for stopping the assassin.

reward.name: Discount at Darkwater General Store
reward.description: Killian offers better prices on his wares after being saved.

description: An assassin, hired by Gizmo, attempts to kill Killian in his store. The player must intervene and stop the attack. Successfully saving Killian allows the player to gain his trust and potentially work with him against Gizmo.

name: Get Gizmo's Confession
objective: Gather evidence that Gizmo, the casino owner, ordered Killian Darkwater's assassination.
first_tasks: Speak to Killian Darkwater about Gizmo's involvement.
Obtain a recording device from Killian.
Confront Gizmo and get him to admit to the crime.

first_task_locations.name: Darkwater General Store
first_task_locations.description: Killian’s shop where the player receives the recording device.

first_task_locations.name: Gizmo’s Casino
first_task_locations.description: The location where the player records Gizmo’s confession.

quest_giver.name: Killian Darkwater
quest_giver.description: The mayor and shopkeeper of Junktown who wants proof against Gizmo.

reward.name: Caps
reward.description: A monetary reward for exposing Gizmo’s criminal activity.

reward.name: Increased reputation in Junktown
reward.description: Earns the trust of Killian and the town’s residents.

description: Killian Darkwater wants solid proof that Gizmo ordered his assassination. The player must record Gizmo’s confession by tricking him into admitting it and then return the evidence to Killian. This leads to further action against Gizmo, determining his fate in Junktown.

name: Kill Killian
objective: Eliminate Killian Darkwater to secure Gizmo's control over Junktown.
first_tasks: Speak to Gizmo and agree to his offer.
Prepare for the fight by acquiring weapons and supplies.
Attack and kill Killian Darkwater.

first_task_locations.name: Gizmo’s Casino
first_task_locations.description: The location where Gizmo hires the player for the job.

first_task_locations.name: Darkwater General Store
first_task_locations.description: Killian’s shop and the place where the assassination attempt happens.

quest_giver.name: Gizmo
quest_giver.description: A casino owner seeking to remove Killian and take over Junktown.

reward.name: Caps
reward.description: A monetary reward from Gizmo for completing the assassination.

reward.name: Gizmo's Favor
reward.description: Access to Gizmo’s resources and potential further work.

description: Gizmo wants Killian Darkwater dead to solidify his hold over Junktown. The player can choose to accept this task and assassinate Killian, altering the power balance in Junktown. This decision influences how the town views the player and changes future interactions.

name: Solve Phil’s Canine Conundrum
objective: Help Phil retrieve his lost dog, Roxie.
first_tasks: Talk to Phil to learn about Roxie’s disappearance.
Search the surrounding area for Roxie.
Lead Roxie back to Phil safely.

first_task_locations.name: Junktown
first_task_locations.description: The town where Phil and his missing dog, Roxie, are located.

first_task_locations.name: Nearby Junkyard
first_task_locations.description: A potential location where Roxie might be found.

quest_giver.name: Phil
quest_giver.description: A worried dog owner who needs help finding his missing pet.

reward.name: Caps
reward.description: Phil’s gratitude in the form of a small sum of money.

reward.name: Karma Increase
reward.description: Helping Phil improves the player's reputation.

description: Phil in Junktown has lost his beloved dog, Roxie. The player must search for the missing canine, either by following clues or asking around. Successfully bringing Roxie back to Phil rewards the player with caps and a reputation boost.

name: Recruit Tycho
objective: Convince Tycho to join your party.
first_tasks: Find Tycho in Junktown.
Talk to Tycho and inquire about his background.
Convince him to join you by discussing mutual goals.

first_task_locations.name: Skum Pitt
first_task_locations.description: A bar in Junktown where Tycho can be found.

quest_giver.name: Tycho
quest_giver.description: A desert ranger with survival knowledge and a strong sense of justice.

reward.name: Tycho as a Companion
reward.description: Tycho joins the player's party as a valuable ally.

description: Tycho, a skilled desert ranger, can be found at the Skum Pitt in Junktown. If the player engages him in conversation and shows alignment with his ideals, he agrees to join the party as a companion.

name: Help Saul
objective: Assist Saul in resolving his conflict with Trish.
first_tasks: Find Saul in the Hub's Downtown area.
Talk to Saul about his situation with Trish.
Speak with Trish to understand her perspective.
Mediate between Saul and Trish or find another resolution.

first_task_locations.name: Downtown Hub
first_task_locations.description: A central district in the Hub where Saul and Trish can be found.

quest_giver.name: Saul
quest_giver.description: A former prizefighter now working as a bartender in the Hub.

reward.name: Experience Points
reward.description: Gained for successfully resolving Saul's problem.

description: Saul, a former prizefighter, is struggling with relationship issues with Trish. The player can intervene by talking to both parties and helping them reach an understanding or resolving the matter differently.

name: Save Trish
objective: Rescue Trish from a dangerous situation in the Hub.
first_tasks: Locate Trish in the Downtown Hub.
Identify the threat to Trish’s safety.
Defeat or negotiate with the aggressors.
Ensure Trish's safety and return her to Saul.

first_task_locations.name: Downtown Hub
first_task_locations.description: A central area of the Hub where Trish is in danger.

quest_giver.name: Saul
quest_giver.description: A former prizefighter working as a bartender, worried about Trish.

reward.name: Experience Points
reward.description: Earned for successfully rescuing Trish.

description: Saul is worried about Trish, who is in danger in the Hub. The player must intervene, eliminate the threat, and ensure her safety.

name: Steal Neal's Urn
objective: Steal Neal's cherished urn from his bar.
first_tasks: Locate Neal’s bar in Junktown.
Find the urn’s exact location inside the bar.
Stealthily steal the urn without getting caught.

first_task_locations.name: Neal’s Bar
first_task_locations.description: A bar in Junktown owned by Neal, where the urn is kept.

quest_giver.description: The quest revolves around stealing the urn; there is no formal quest giver.

reward.name: Neal’s Urn
reward.description: A sentimental object belonging to Neal.

description: The player must steal Neal’s prized urn without alerting him or other Junktown residents. The consequences of being caught may lead to hostilities.

name: Kill Neal
objective: Eliminate Neal, the owner of the bar in Junktown.
first_tasks: Locate Neal’s bar in Junktown.
Engage Neal in combat or find an alternative method to eliminate him.
Avoid or handle any potential retaliation from Junktown residents.

first_task_locations.name: Neal’s Bar
first_task_locations.description: A bar in Junktown owned by Neal, known for enforcing his own rules.

quest_giver.description: The quest involves killing Neal, but no formal quest giver is mentioned.

reward.name: Neal’s Possessions
reward.description: Loot from Neal’s body and any items found in his bar.

description: The player must eliminate Neal, the bar owner in Junktown. Killing him may provoke hostilities from nearby NPCs and affect the player's reputation in Junktown.

name: Dispose of Merchant
objective: Eliminate a merchant as part of an assigned task.
first_tasks: Locate the targeted merchant.
Decide on an approach: direct combat, stealth, or deception.
Avoid unwanted attention from guards or nearby NPCs.

first_task_locations.name: Merchant's Location
first_task_locations.description: The merchant's shop or traveling route where they conduct business.

quest_giver.description: The quest involves eliminating a merchant, but no formal quest giver is explicitly mentioned.

reward.name: Merchant’s Inventory
reward.description: Items and caps that can be looted from the merchant’s body.

description: The player must eliminate a merchant without drawing too much attention. The approach can vary depending on stealth, combat, or social manipulation, and the consequences may impact the player’s standing with factions or towns.

name: Dispose of Jain
objective: Eliminate Jain as part of an assigned task.
first_tasks: Locate Jain in the Children of the Cathedral.
Decide on an approach: direct combat, stealth, or deception.
Avoid unwanted attention from other members of the Cathedral.

first_task_locations.name: Children of the Cathedral
first_task_locations.description: A religious organization based in the wasteland, acting as a front for the Master's army.

quest_giver.name: Unknown (Potentially an enemy of the Cathedral)
quest_giver.description: A character who seeks the removal of Jain due to ideological or strategic reasons.

reward.name: Loot from Jain
reward.description: Items and potential documents carried by Jain.

description: The player must eliminate Jain, a high-ranking member of the Children of the Cathedral. The method can vary based on stealth, direct combat, or manipulation, and the consequences may affect the player’s reputation with the faction.

name: Find the Missing Caravans
objective: Investigate and determine the fate of missing trade caravans.
first_tasks: Speak to Butch at the Far Go Traders.
Gather information about the missing caravans.
Investigate possible leads, including attacks by raiders or super mutants.

first_task_locations.name: Far Go Traders
first_task_locations.description: A major trading company in the wasteland, concerned about missing caravans.

quest_giver.name: Butch
quest_giver.description: The leader of the Far Go Traders, worried about the disappearing caravans.
quest_giver.location: Far Go Traders headquarters in The Hub

reward.name: Caps
reward.description: Payment for uncovering the mystery and resolving the issue.

description: Several caravans have gone missing, and the Far Go Traders need someone to uncover the truth. The player must investigate various leads, including attacks by raiders, possible super mutant involvement, or betrayals within the trading companies.

name: Steal Necklace from the Merchants
objective: Steal a valuable necklace from the merchants without getting caught.
first_tasks: Identify the merchant carrying the necklace.
Find a way to distract or pickpocket the target.

description: Vault 13 is running out of water, and the player must negotiate with the Water Merchants in the Hub to secure a steady supply. While this extends the Vault's survival, it also increases the chances of revealing its location to hostile forces.

description: The player uncovers that Iguana Bob is selling human meat disguised as iguana. They must decide whether to blackmail him for caps, expose him to the authorities, or let the operation continue.

description: Irwin, a displaced farmer in the Hub, pleads for help in reclaiming his farm from a group of raiders. The player can take on the challenge, eliminate the raiders, and restore Irwin’s home, earning a reward for their efforts.
